a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Deaths from protein-energy malnutrition, by age, World, 1990 to
The estimated annual number of deaths from protein-energy malnutrition (which results from insufficient caloric and protein intake).
Estimates come with wide uncertainties especially for countries with poor vital registration.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
